
import PartialResourceFieldRefreference from "./resourceFieldRef_reference.mdx"


<details className="config-field" data-expandable="true" open>
<summary>

##### `resourceFieldRef` <span className="config-field-required" data-required="false">required</span> <span className="config-field-type">object</span> <span className="config-field-default"></span> <span className="config-field-enum"></span> {#runners-spec-clusterRef-podTemplate-spec-env-valueFrom-resourceFieldRef}

Selects a resource of the container: only resources limits and requests
(limits.cpu, limits.memory, limits.ephemeral-storage, requests.cpu, requests.memory and requests.ephemeral-storage) are currently supported.

</summary>

<PartialResourceFieldRefreference />


</details>
